description: Temporary use of the space for a series of special event film screenings which are due to take place each Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday for a period from Thursday August 2nd until Sunday September 2nd. In addition there will be Tuesday a Community Screening (for local residents only) - to take place between 1600 - 2300 on August 14th and an additional public performance on Monday August 27th - Bank Holiday Monday - 1500 - 2300. Weekend events will take place between 1500 and 2300. The site will include a number of temporary structures to house event venues, catering establishments, bars and activties as well as a number of set pieces and a large film screen. In the non-public areas there will be a number of temporary buildings (offices, dressing rooms, storage etc) as well as infrastructure and facilities to include water, power, waste and HVAC equipment as required (Out of Borough Consultation from London Borough of Hounslow)
